tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_locations ( 
 id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 user_id INT, 
 latitude DECIMAL(9,6), 
 longitude DECIMAL(9,6));

CREATE TABLE check_ins ( 
 id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 user_id INT, 
 location_id INT, 
 check_in_time TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE users ( 
 id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 username VARCHAR(50), 
 email VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE locations ( 
 id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 name VARCHAR(100), 
 latitude DECIMAL(9,6), 
 longitude DECIMAL(9,6));
